verbose_text: Incretins are a group of gastrointestinal hormones, predominantly glucagon like peptide 1 (GLP-1) and glucose dependent insulinotropic polypeptide (GIP), that are secreted in response to food ingestion and stimulate insulin secretion.
evidence: glucose-dependent insulinotropic polypeptide (GIP), that are secreted in response to food ingestion and stimulate insulin
